approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller's account multiple times, up to the value amount.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another address.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to another address.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with a name, symbol, decimals, and total supply.

addPauser.description: Adds an address as a pauser.

renouncePauser.description: Renounces the pauser role of the caller.

isPauser.description: Checks if an address is a pauser.

admin.description: Returns the address of the current admin.

changeAdmin.description: Changes the admin of the contract.

implementation.description: Returns the address of the current implementation.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of an account.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of an owner.

Paused.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Unpaused.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.

PauserAdded.description: Emitted when a pauser is added.

PauserRemoved.description: Emitted when a pauser is removed.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when a spender is approved to withdraw from an owner's account.
